name: Trickle - Magic Canvas
tagline: The 1st Agentic Canvas for building apps visually with AI
description: Trickle Magic Canvas - the world’s 1st agentic canvas where you can co-create with AI, visually, to ship production-ready apps & websites. It‘s a visual space for context engineering, where the agent better understands your intentions & builds multi-page apps.

name: Clearitty
tagline: Human-verified signals for smarter sales outreach
description: Clearitty is a next generation sales intelligence platform that helps GTM teams focus only on accounts that are truly in-market. Combine real-time buyer intent signals, AI-powered deal scoring, and human-verified buyer insights, with unique stakeholder mapping

name: Zams
tagline: The Sales Automation Platform for B2B companies
description: Zams lets you build AI agents that automate every part of sales—from CRM ops to meeting prep—using plain English. No rigid workflows. No setup. Just agents that run 24/7 across 100+ apps to get work done for you.

name: commitify.me
tagline: AI agents that CALL your phone to keep you on track
description: Commitify is an AI voice agent that CALLS your phone to keep you on track. It’s a real cellular call that feels like any other, making it way easier for the AI to reach you and keep you accountable. Our agents range from serious to hilarious, try for FREE!

name: Qwen3-Coder
tagline: A powerful open model for agentic coding tasks
description: Qwen3-Coder is a new 480B MoE open model (35B active) by the Qwen team, built for agentic coding. It achieves SOTA results on benchmarks like SWE-bench, supports up to 1M context, and comes with an open-source CLI tool, Qwen Code.

name: SaveIt.now
tagline: Organize nothing. Find everything.
description: A smart and minimalist bookmarking tool. No tags, no folders. Just save. Then use our AI-powered full-text search to find any link — even across languages.

name: Super for iOS
tagline: Counter/Activity Tracking hybrid app for minimalists
description: Super Counter is the simplest counter and activity tracking app on iOS! It combines the best of both without unnecessary features. Whether you're counting prayer chants, tracking walks, or workout achievements, Super Counter makes it easy and flexible.

name: LLMs.txt Generator
tagline: Convert websites to LLMs.txt format in seconds
description: Create LLMs.txt files for free. Transform any website into AI-ready structured content. No API keys or signup required. Perfect for ChatGPT, Claude, and other large language models. Fast, reliable, and privacy-focused.

name: MinuteText
tagline: $1 message for 1 minute or possibly FOREVER | Make it count
description: Pay $1 to display your message for 1 minute on our digital billboard. If your message is the last one, it stays here FOREVER. Join thousands sharing their thoughts.

name: Composer MCP Server
tagline: Create, backtest, and execute trades directly in Claude.
description: The Composer MCP Server gives Claude AI the power to backtest investment ideas and execute automated trading strategies. Trade across stocks, ETFs, and crypto directly in Claude.

name: TurboStyle
tagline: Visual editor for any website
description: Effortlessly adjust styles, update text, swap visuals, and explore design ideas — right inside your browser. No setup needed.

name: Readwell
tagline: Find books you’ll love with AI-powered recommendations.
description: Readwell is an AI-powered book discovery app that finds titles you’ll actually love based on your taste, mood, and bookshelf. No more scrolling or guessing what to read next. Just take a pic of your books and let the Readwell do the rest. Start enjoying books!

name: Troov
tagline: Meet someone special doing what you love
description: Troov is a new meetup app designed to help users propose one-on-one activity ideas and connect over their shared passions. Whether you're looking for friendship, dating, or collaboration, Troov provides a platform for meaningful connections.

name: iipmaps
tagline: No-code maps, charts and stories from your data
description: iipmaps turns messy PDFs and CSVs into clean, on-brand visuals fast. Upload data, our AI fixes columns and locations, you pick a template and export. Maps, charts, explainers. Used by FMCG, gov and startups to brief execs and blow up on social.

name: GenFa.st
tagline: Your entire studio, in a single prompt.
description: GenFast is your AI-powered creative studio. Generate images, videos, voiceovers, music, and fully edited content from a prompt or reference photo - ready to publish in minutes. One platform, zero hassle, pro results.

name: MoFace for MacOS
tagline: A live cam app to feature yourself
description: Effortlessly put yourself in focus with MoFace! Float your camera window above any app, customize its look, add labels, switch cameras, and flip your view instantly. Perfect for calls, presentations, and streaming—stand out and express yourself!

name: Soundverse iOS and Android App
tagline: Ethical, advanced AI Music generator & AI song generator
description: Generate and edit AI-powered music with Soundverse. Create custom tunes on-the-go and share them across social media.

name: Parachute Backup
tagline: Seamless backup for iCloud drive and iCloud photos
description: Parachute is a seamless backup utility for iCloud Photos and iCloud Drive. Keep your memories and documents safe by backing them up to your own storage (external hard drive, NAS, other clouds like Google Drive or Dropbox, etc).

name: SumFin
tagline: SumFin now available on iOS and Android
description: Build your personalised feed of real-time, summarised stock market news. Watch specific stocks to shape the articles you see, pin important stories and stay updated on what fellow investors are interested in with our trending wall. Invest smarter with SumFin.

name: Dream Story Live - AI Journaling App
tagline: Journaling made easier with AI-guided self-reflection
description: Capture Your Thoughts Effortlessly with Dream Story Live, The AI-powered Journaling App Designed for Self-reflection, Mental Clarity, and Personal Growth. Start Today!
